Author: AkhilThomas
Summary: This script rescales your Azure VMs using the tags specified on the VMs. The script has 3 parameters - RGEXCEPTIONS,VMEXCEPTIONS,SCALEUP. VMs should have 2 tags - 'ScaleupSize' and 'ScaledownSize'. The script uses default connection asset 'AzureRunAsConnection'.
Title: Auto Resize Azure VMs by using Tags
UserTags: VM Lifecycle Management, Dev / Test Environments, Powershell automation,azureautomationrunbookgallery
